Moves.Name: Absorb
Moves.Description: An attack that absorbs half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

Moves.Name: Acid
Moves.Description: The foe is sprayed with a harsh, hide-melting acid that may lower DEFENSE.

Moves.Name: Acid Armor
Moves.Description: The user alters its cells to liquefy itself and sharply raise DEFENSE.

Moves.Name: Aerial Ace
Moves.Description: An extremely fast attack against one target. It can’t be evaded.

Moves.Name: Aeroblast
Moves.Description: A vortex of air is shot at the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: Agility
Moves.Description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to sharply boost its SPEED.

Moves.Name: Air Cutter
Moves.Description: The foe is hit with razor-like wind. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: Amnesia
Moves.Description: Forgets about something and sharply raises SP. DEF.

Moves.Name: Ancientpower
Moves.Description: An ancient power is used to attack. It may also raise all the user’s stats.

Moves.Name: Arm Thrust
Moves.Description: A quick flurry of straight-arm punches that hit two to five times.

Moves.Name: Aromatherapy
Moves.Description: A soothing scent is released to heal all status problems in the user’s party.

Moves.Name: Assist
Moves.Description: The user randomly picks and uses a move of an allied POKéMON.

Moves.Name: Astonish
Moves.Description: An attack using a startling shout. It also may make the foe flinch.

Moves.Name: Attract
Moves.Description: If it is the other gender, the foe is made infatuated and unlikely to attack.

Moves.Name: Aurora Beam
Moves.Description: A rainbow-colored attack beam. It may lower the foe’s ATTACK stat.

Moves.Name: Barrage
Moves.Description: Round objects are hurled at the foe to strike two to five times.

Moves.Name: Ember
Moves.Description: The foe is attacked with small flames. The foe may suffer a burn.

Moves.Name: Flamethrower
Moves.Description: The foe is scorched with intense flames. The foe may suffer a burn.

Moves.Name: Growl
Moves.Description: The user growls in a cute way, making the foe lower its ATTACK stat.

Moves.Name: Scratch
Moves.Description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the foe.

Moves.Name: Tackle
Moves.Description: A physical attack in which the user charges, full body, into the foe.

Moves.Name: Vine Whip
Moves.Description: The foe is struck with slender, whiplike vines.

Moves.Name: Water Gun
Moves.Description: The foe is struck with a lot of water expelled forcibly from the mouth.
